bit.instruction: Wie endet der Satz in der indirekten Rede? Wähle aus den Vorgaben aus und beachte dabei den Einleitungssatz.

bitmark:
[.multiple-choice-text:bitmark--]
[@id:216178]
[%Nr. 2320]
[!Wenn der Einleitungssatz in der indirekten Rede im Simple Past steht, werden Zeitangaben verändert. Welche Zeitangabe wird wie verändert? Wähle die richtige Form aus dem Auswahlmenü.]
1. today - [-a week before][+that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]
2. yesterday - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][+the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]
3. tomorrow - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][+the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]
4. a week ago - [+a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]
5. last weekend - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][+the weekend before][-those days][-then]
6. next week - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][+the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]
7. these days - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][+those days][-then]
8. last week - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][+the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]
9. now - [-a week before][-that day][-that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][+then]
10. this morning - [-a week before][-that day][+that morning][-the day before][-the following week][-the next day][-the week before][-the weekend before][-those days][-then]

bit.instruction: Wenn der Einleitungssatz in der indirekten Rede im Simple Past steht, werden Zeitangaben verändert. Welche Zeitangabe wird wie verändert? Wähle die richtige Form aus dem Auswahlmenü.
